resources.string: Skills: MSSQL, MySQL, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, C#, C/C++, WPF
About me: About 1 year of experience in non-commercial projects using HTML5, CSS, PHP, Javascript, Java. Easy to learn and retrain. Personal goal - permanent professional growth.

Multi-paradigm programming language. Supports object-oriented, imperative and functional styles. Commonly used as an embeddable language for programmatic access to application objects. Most widely used in browsers as a scripting language for making web pages interactive

strongly typed object oriented a general-purpose programming language developed by Sun Microsystems (subsequently acquired by Oracle). Developed by the community organized through the Java Community Process; language and the main technologies that implement it distributed under the GPL license. Java applications are usually translated into special bytecode, therefore they can run on any computer architecture for which an implementation exists Java virtual machine.

Operating system for various electronic devices. Originally developed by Android, Inc. which was then acquired by Google. Based on the Linux kernel and proprietary implementation Google Java Virtual Machine. Subsequently, Google initiated the creation the Open Handset Alliance, which supports and further develops the platform. Android allows you to run Java applications that control the device through the developed Google Libraries. Android Native Development Kit allows you to port libraries and application components written in the C programming language and other languages.
